DataElement.preferredName: Regular Physical Activity Past 2 Weeks Participation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not there was participation in regular physical activity in the past two weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Regular Physical Activity Past 2 Weeks Participation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern._Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._The act of taking part in an activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Concepts.definition: Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.:The act of taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.
